title.vi: Top 10+ Best Eyelash Extensions in District 2 (Thao Dien) | Best Lash Salon Near Me
title.en: Top 10+ Best Eyelash Extensions in District 2 (Thao Dien) | Best Lash Salon Near Me

excerpt.vi: Discover the TOP 10+ best places for eyelash extensions in District 2 (Thao Dien). Leading the list is Nanky Beauty, the premium international standard lash salon near you.
excerpt.en: Discover the TOP 10+ best places for eyelash extensions in District 2 (Thao Dien). Leading the list is Nanky Beauty, the premium international standard lash salon near you.

content.vi:
Possessing sparkling, attractive eyes is the dream of many women. Eyelash extensions are the perfect solution to help you achieve curled, thick, and natural-looking lashes. However, with countless lash salons in District 2, choosing a reputable location is not easy. We would like to introduce you to the “Top 10 Best Places for Eyelash Extensions in District 2” to help you find the best lash extensions near me.

1. Nanky Beauty – Top Choice for Lash Extensions in Thao Dien

Address: 71 Vanh Dai Tay, An Khanh Ward, District 2, HCMC (Thao Dien Area)

Hotline: 0852.759.678

Opening Hours: 08:00 – 21:00 (Monday - Sunday)

Rating: 5.0 ⭐ - A premium lash salon in District 2 trusted by the international community and beauty enthusiasts.

Topping the list of best eyelash extensions in District 2 is none other than Nanky Beauty. Located in the heart of Thao Dien, Nanky Beauty is not just a lash salon, but a place where art and peak technique converge. This is the ideal destination for those searching for a "lash salon near me" that offers meticulousness, superior technique, and a luxurious, absolutely safe environment.

Nanky Beauty's strength lies in its team of Internationally Trained Masters with years of experience, combined with the exclusive use of premium imported products from Korea, the UK, and the USA. The hygiene and sterilization process here strictly adheres to medical standards, ensuring absolute safety for your eyes. If you are looking for a 'custom-designed' lash set in Thao Dien, perfect in every detail, Nanky Beauty is the choice you cannot miss.

2. Tru Beauty

Address: 92/11 Quoc Huong, Thao Dien, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City.

Hotline: 0283 8271 771

Opening Hours: 10:00 – 20:00

Tru Beauty is one of the reputable and professional lash extension facilities in District 2. The experienced team here provides high-quality lash services, ensuring safety and creating long, curled, and seductive lashes for every client.

3. The Privé Spa

Address: 40 Thai Ly, Thao Dien, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City.

Hotline: 0909 096 491

Opening Hours: 09:00 – 21:00

Located in the vibrant Thao Dien area, The Privé Spa is a trusted venue with a highly skilled team. Not only does it offer quality eyelash extension services, but The Privé Spa also boasts a luxurious, modern space, creating a comfortable and relaxing atmosphere.

4. Wings Lashes

Address: Level 5, 08-09 Estella Place, 88 Song Hanh, An Phu, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City.

Hotline: 1800 8154

Wings Lashes is a professional lash extension salon in District 2, HCMC. With a team of highly skilled experts, Wings Lashes delivers quality services, focusing on exquisite technique and using safe materials to enhance your natural beauty.

5. Cosmo Spa

Mai Lan Eyelash is a reputable lash facility in District 2. With a well-trained staff and the use of high-quality products, they provide an excellent experience for anyone looking for "eyelash extensions near me".

7. Thao Nguyen

Thao Nguyen is famous for providing high-quality, safe, and effective lash services nearby District 2. The facility uses premium lash types to ensure safety and no skin irritation.

8. CnC Lash Bar

Address: 57 Truc Duong, Thao Dien, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City.

Hotline: 0945 610 128

CnC Lash Bar is a well-known address for beautiful lash extensions in Thao Dien, District 2. Not only famous for service quality, this facility is also highly rated for its luxurious, modern, and friendly space.

9. Beautepub.saigon
